name: Elegy Consolle
description: Elegy, designed by Roberto Lazzeroni in 2017, is a sophisticated console that confirms the company's commitment to luxury craftsmanship. A desire to experiment, which translates into mastery of processing techniques and attention to detail. Wall-mountable, it is made of solid American walnut. The top, semi-elliptical, can be in wood or marble. Customizable with multiple finishes, the console becomes an original piece of furniture capable of creating tailor-made spaces.
